## Instructions

### 1. Ingest 
* In the Ingest tab - choose database
* Click "Load Database"

### 2. Consider the Context
* read the welcom message
* click the "Additional Info" tab for more info about the loaded database
  - i.e. metadata
  
### 3. Play and Explore
* Using the  selector on the left sidebar you can choose what variables and measures you would like to visualize.  
  * e.g. choosing a bunch of "target omics" 
* There are a variety of plots in the "Playground"
  - Quantities 
    * box/violin plots for marginal statistics
    * heatmap / dot-plot for visualizing the aggregated measures for chosen -omics
  - Differential plots
    * volcano plots of differential expression 
    * plus interactive auxuilary distributions and meta 
  - Table browsing
  - (FUTURE) a pre-computed QC report of the data
